channel.title: 2020/03 on Martin Sitar
channel.description: Recent content in 2020/03 on Martin Sitar

item.title: MinimaList
item.description: I’ve never been one to make to-do lists. I jot down thoughts in a notebook, and over the years when I needed a list I’ve relied on the Notes app in iOS. It’s straightforward, comes bundled with my phone and has done the job. In the past few months my work and personal life got quite busy and I found myself frustrated with Notes. I wanted a free, dead simple to-do app where I could file away the little tasks I was keeping in my head all day.
